title: Revisiting The Stories Told In Murrow's 'Harvest of Shame'
teaser: Elizabeth Blair visits Belle Glade, Fla., where Edward R. Murrow's film crew recorded migrant farm workers. (This piece was originally broadcast on Weekend Edition Saturday on May 31, 2014.)
